document.discussion_title: Out of the ordinary Coast Guard rescues Florida man from unsuccessful bubble journey to Bermuda
document.topic_text: Out of the ordinary: Coast Guard rescues Florida man from unsuccessful bubble journey to Bermuda Source: UPI April 25, 2016 at 9:19 AM POMPANO BEACH, Fla., April 24 (UPI) -- The U.S. Coast Guard retrieved an endurance runner after he ended his aquatic voyage from South Florida to the Bermuda Triangle in his "hydropod" early Sunday. Continue reading You May Have Missed...
